rules_text:
Ninjutsu {3}{U}{U} [i]({3}{U}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Flying
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card. Then if this creature entered this turn, create a token that's a copy of it.
